column1: #Text=Yes, there is misery in the Middle East.
#Text=It will only get better when those who run stay home and fight it.
#Text=If the default option is always 'The West', the refugee crisis will see no end.

#Text=The intersection of tribal boundaries, family blood feuds, a Sunni-Shia hate divide that worships killing, and, arms merchants ready to arm anything with a Toyota pick-up and a million bucks, ensures that it continues.
#Text=The refugee response in the West is merely moving the problem around and we should not feel guilty for opting out of it.
